sentences.en: A panel of judges will choose the winner.
sentences.cn: 会由一个评判小组选出冠军。

sentences.en: Choose a soft, medium or firm mattress to suit their individual needs.
sentences.cn: 针对他们各人不同的需要挑选柔软、软硬适中或者坚硬的床垫。

sentences.en: Choose shades which tone in with your natural colouring.
sentences.cn: 选择与你本身的肤色相衬的颜色。

sentences.en: For added protection choose a lipstick with a sun screen.
sentences.cn: 选择防晒护唇膏来增强保护。

sentences.en: He chose his words carefully as he spoke.
sentences.cn: 他说话时字斟句酌。

sentences.en: I don’t mind which one we have – you choose.
sentences.cn: 我们要哪一个我无所谓，你来挑吧。

sentences.en: It is always best to choose organically grown foods if possible.
sentences.cn: 如果可能，最好还是挑选有机食品。

sentences.en: It is always important to choose enjoyable, nutritious foods.
sentences.cn: 选择好吃的、营养价值高的食物总是很重要。

sentences.en: It took us ages to choose a new carpet.
sentences.cn: 我们挑选新地毯花了很长时间。

sentences.en: Knox had taken it on himself to choose the wine.
sentences.cn: 诺克斯擅自作主，选了葡萄酒。

sentences.en: Lathan had to choose between marrying her and keeping his job.
sentences.cn: 莱森不得不在娶她和保住工作之间作出选择。

sentences.en: The default is usually the setting that most users would probably choose.
sentences.cn: 默认选项通常是大多数用户都会选择的设置。

sentences.en: There is very little to choose between the world's top tennis players.
sentences.cn: 世界顶级网球运动员之间往往难分伯仲。

sentences.en: They can transfer or share the contract with whosoever they choose.
sentences.cn: 他们可以与他们选择的任何人交换或分享这份合约。

sentences.en: They must choose between two evenly matched candidates for governor.
sentences.cn: 他们必须在两位不相上下的州长候选人之间作出选择。

sentences.en: We, the patients, cannot pick and choose our doctors.
sentences.cn: 我们患者不能对医生挑挑拣拣。

sentences.en: Why did he choose these pale, nerveless, uninteresting people?
sentences.cn: 他为什么选了这么些脸色苍白、有气无力而又无聊乏味的人？

sentences.en: Without adequate information, many students choose a college almost blindly.
sentences.cn: 因为缺少足够的信息，许多学生都是近乎盲目地选择大学。

sentences.en: You can just take out the interest each year, if you choose.
sentences.cn: 你要是愿意，每年可以仅支取利息。

sentences.en: You can, if you choose, invest in the stock market.
sentences.cn: 如果你愿意，可以投资股票市场。

words.tran_cn: 选择器；选举人；选择者；投票者

phrases.tran_cn: 选球员组队：在棒球或软式棒球等运动中挑选队员组成两方或两队

phrases.phrase: there is little (或 nothing) to choose between

trans.tran_en: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want

trans.tran_cn: 挑选， 选择； 选定； 愿意
trans.tran_en: to decide which one of a number of things or people you want
